    • getRandomBoard

      public Board getRandomBoard​(int sizeX, int sizeY, int numberOfMines)
      Create a board with random mine placement.
      Parameters:
      sizeX - Horizontal size of the board.
      sizeY - Vertical size of the board.
      numberOfMines - Number of mines to place on the board.
      Returns:
      Generated board.

    • getBoardFromBooleanMatrix

      public Board getBoardFromBooleanMatrix​(boolean[][] booleanMatrix)
      Create a board from a 2D array of boolean values.
      Parameters:
      booleanMatrix - 2D array of boolean values. Contains true where mines should be placed, false everywhere else. Must be a valid rectangular matrix.
      Returns:
      Generated board.
